arabic: ۞ وَعَنَتِ الْوُجُوهُ لِلْحَيِّ الْقَيُّومِ ۖ وَقَدْ خَابَ مَنْ حَمَلَ ظُلْمًا
english: And (all) faces shall be humbled before (Allah), the Ever Living, the One Who sustains and protects all that exists. And he who carried (a burden of) wrongdoing (i.e. he who disbelieved in Allah, ascribed partners to Him, and did deeds of His disobedience), became indeed a complete failure (on that Day).
bengali: সেই চিরঞ্জীব চিরস্থায়ীর সামনে সব মুখমন্ডল অবনমিত হবে এবং সে ব্যর্থ হবে যে জুলুমের বোঝা বহন করবে।
